events.name: DevFest Bukavu 2017
events.description:
DevFest 2017 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

DevFest Bukavu 2017 will have different activities from speaker sessions, Codelabs, speaker sessions, startup Fireside chats and a Hackathon.
GDG Bukavu 2017 is aimed at equipping attendees with different skills (both technical and business) required for them to compete in the industry and also run successful companies, using Google technologies.
We shall also present opportunities available for organisations, companies to improve their businesses and developers who are interested in using Google platforms to develop software.

Audience:

Organisations, companies and institutions, Developers, Entrepreneurs, University students and Government.
As part of the DevFest17, we shall also host a Firebase App together with the developers, where they will build an app in a day using Firebase and Cloud Functions. And we're going to make a hackathon, through which the winners will be rewarded.
